meanings.definition: A boat race or series of boat races.
meanings.sent1: The local regattas were a fun event for families to watch.
meanings.sent2: Every summer, the town hosts regattas on the lake.
meanings.sent3: The regattas turned into a friendly competition between the neighboring towns.
meanings.sent4: Her determination in the regattas was like a strong wind pushing her forward.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sails of the boats in the regattas painted a beautiful picture on the water.

meanings.definition: An organized series of races or other competitions.
meanings.sent1: The school regattas brought together students from different grades.
meanings.sent2: The annual regattas included various sports competitions for all ages.
meanings.sent3: The regattas for charity raised a significant amount of money for the cause.
meanings.sent4: The regattas of talent shows showcased the diverse skills of the participants.
meanings.sent5: The intense atmosphere of the regattas made the spectators cheer loudly.
